name: SweetAir
0:
”Alexa, open Sweet Air”
”Alexa, ask Sweet Air for a detailed report”
”Alexa, ask Sweet Air for the nearest indoor sensor”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sweet air
des: This Skill will find your nearest PurpleAir sensor. This will return your nearest AQI as well as an indication of which device is being used.
